name: Light In The Dark (itch) (LuisAlarconGames)
description:
Help an anglerfish in this deep sea environment! WASD or Arrow Keys to move, try to get a high score!

Game made for the Mini Jam 109

Music:

Half Mystery by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5026-half-mystery
